Client Management

Sourcing

Team Management

Business Development

Others:
• Played a major role in Recruiting and Coordinating the H1B Walk-in Interview for Microsoft through Aditi Technologies. • Conducted Preliminary interviews onsite in Tech Mahindra on their request and played a major role in coordinating. • Proactively maintained an effective resource database management system to close the manpower requirement with the minimum time. • Has also played a major role in Functional Testing of the recruitment solution Product to get the recruitment process in to a good shape

patent.title: Guest/Hypervisor Interrupt Coalescing for Storage Adapter Virtual Function in Guest Passthrough Mode
patent.summary: A system and method are provided that involve a host computing machine and an SR IOV storage adapter in which the host machine hosts a virtual machine having a guest operating system (guest) coupled for direct passthrough IOV data path and also hosts a virtualization intermediary; a guest operating system (guest) and a virtualization intermediary exchange information concerning IO completions through a shared memory space; the guest writes information to a shared memory space that is indicative of whether an IO completion queue has reached a fill level since the most recently dispatched interrupt at which it is unsafe to coalesce an interrupt; the virtualization intermediary writes information to the shared memory space that is indicative of the interrupt most recently delivered to the guest; the virtualization intermediary reads the information written by the guest to the shared memory space that is indicative of whether an IO completion queue has reached a fill level since the most recently dispatched interrupt at which it is unsafe to coalesce an interrupt; the guest reads the information written to the shared memory space that is indicative of the interrupt most recently delivered to the guest; virtual interrupt coalescing determinations are made based upon the information shred through the shared memory space.

patent.title: Virtual Machine Access to Storage Via a Multi-Queue IO Storage Adapter With Optimized Cache Affinity and PCPU Load Balancing
patent.summary: A method is provided for use in a system that includes a host machine that includes multiple physical CPUs (PCPUs) and at least two cache nodes that are shared by different sets of the PCPUs, comprising: creating in a memory device multiple sets of lanes each lane set associated with a respective PCPU set; tracking levels of processing activity of the PCPUs of each PCPU set; using an MSIX vector value to associate lanes with PCPUs; receiving a IO request from any given PCPU from among the multiple PCPUs; and assigning the IO request to a respective lane based at least in part upon the PCPU set associated with the lane and PCPU processing activity levels.

patent.title: VIRTUALIZATION INTERMEDIARY/VIRTUAL MACHINE GUEST OPERATING SYSTEM COLLABORATIVE SCSI PATH MANAGEMENT
patent.summary: A method of direct access by a virtual machine (VM) running on a host machine to physical storage via a virtual function (VF) running on an input/output (IO) adapter comprising: providing by a virtualization intermediary running on the host machine an indication of an active path associated with a virtual storage device; obtaining by a guest driver running within a guest operating system of the VM the stored indication of the active path from the shared memory region; dispatching an IO request by the guest driver to the VF that includes an indication of the active path; and sending by the VF an IO request that includes the indicated active path.

position.title: Manager-HR
position.summary: Generalist HR Profile.

position.title: Sr. Member of Technical Staff
position.summary:
I did the following projects:
- Efficient migration of memory pages from a NUMA node to another NUMA node when the VM execution migrates across the NUMA node. This effort led to the following patent: http://www.freshpatents.com/-dt20091217ptan20090313445.php
- Schedule VMs across NUMA nodes to ensure fairness only in execution times, but also in terms of locality of memory
- A detailed study of the pros and cons of the AMD RVI technology.
Besides above, I was involved in hiring new people from the team, and guiding new joinees in their projects.

position.title: Member of Technical Staff
position.summary: Analyzed performance of various workloads on 64 bit virtualization platforms. In particular, found answers to questions like following: - For various workloads, which virtualization technique (the software i.e. binary translation, or the hardware i.e. VT) is a better technique - For various workloads, which characteristics contribute to the workload running better with one of the virtualization techniques - How can we write our code better to reduce the virtualization overhead - How can the application be modified to run faster on virtualized platform

education.notes: I mostly took finance courses to keep myself entertained.

During my M.S. thesis, I proposed a new method to conserve memory energy in the environment where memory is accessed primarily by the DMA (rather than the processor). The research was published in HPCA 2005: http://citeseerx.ist.psu.edu/viewdoc/summary?doi=10.1.1.76.5156
Prior to that, I worked on implementing a new memory management algorithm in linux kernel to allocate the memory amongst the processes so that number of page faults is optimized. Our research was published in ASPLOS 2004: http://portal.acm.org/citation.cfm?id=1024415

I was mostly a theory student at IIT Kanpur. In my undergraduate thesis, we (my partner and I) tried to prove that bipartite matching problem belongs to complexity class NC. We reduced the problem to proving an inequality regarding bipartite graph. While there are strong indications that the inequality is true, and we could prove the inequality for several classes of bipartite graphs, a complete proof eluded us, and the original problem continues to elude the community.
My graduating GPA was 9.7/10

position.title: Associate Manager - TA
position.summary:
 Direct responsible for Major Business Units (BU's) staffing needs  Responsible for entire gamut of recruitment process from understanding the requisition needs, sourcing, screening, arranging Technical & Management panels for scheduling interviews, ensuring the fitment of the selected candidates with in the budget and getting the necessary approvals in case of any exceptional cases.  Act as SPOC for the Business Units and candidates during the entire selection process.  Responsible for forecasting and planning to generate the pool of resources for the upcoming projects to make them available in need of future.  Responsible to build up a back up resource to the existing offer candidates to avoid the last minute drop outs, in turn to save the billing loss of the project.  Work exclusively for Week end / Week day drives and line up the candidates according to the expectations and coordinating interviews.  Assess the candidates in HR interviews and Reference check process.  Ensure the recruitment process complies with process audits.
 Utilizing internal referrals, internal database and various internet sources to fill the open demand.  Employee engagement and preparing offer letter and follow-up till he/she joins.  Preparing weekly/monthly report and sharing with respective projects & management.  Handling the vendor (agency) channel for all skills and solving vendor challenges and queries.

position.title: Executive - HR
position.summary:  Understanding business forecast/pipeline and building a resourcing plan to meet their needs. Refreshing the plan regularly. Maintaining regular communication with the Unit  End-to-end recruitment through the use of Smart Recruit.  Create/place advertisements – Job postings.  Initial screening and profile matching with reference to Educational Qualification, Total Experience, Relevant Skill sets, Communication skills.  Brief candidates about client, project requirements and compensation package.  Coordinate interviews at all phases of recruitment process which include setting up Technical interviews for candidates in India and abroad.  Identify and establish one-to-one relationship with the leading placement consultants in Chennai.  Conduct HR Interviews, compensation negotiation and reference checks of technically cleared candidates.  Issue of offer letters to the selected candidates and do the regular follow-up till the time of joining.  Active participant in Campus recruitment, Job Fairs and other Campaigns.  Strategic Resourcing for specific Service Areas based on approved plans and staffing projections.  Identifying internal resources for various projects.  Handling the Bench Resources and providing the deployment plan  Responsible for Contract resources in terms of contract extension, absorption and termination.

person.headline: Talent Aquisition at TEKsystems Global Services

position.title: Resource Analyst
position.summary:
For Citi Financials (TAG) Talent Acquisition Group
A leading global Technology and IT enterprises with annual revenues of US$5 billion. HCL team comprises 60,000 professionals of diverse nationalities, operating across 16 countries including 300 points of presence in India. Responsibilities:
Resourcing of skilled and talented manpower Recruitment & Selection strategy for the organization. Ensuring of all Recruitment Policy and procedures being followed End to end process of Hiring (Sourcing, Screening, Scheduling, Coordinating interviews, HR Interviews, and releasing offers. Responsible for full life-cycle recruitment and placement for the given requirement. To understand the requirement coming directly from the Business Unit. To identify the Sourcing strategy and Database Explore all channels of recruitments like interacting with the vendors, taking references from existing candidates etc. for sourcing of the right candidates. Releasing offer letter from smart recruit Recruitment Tracker maintenance. Follow up with offered candidates and keep track on their joining dates Extensive use of Internet recruiting tools of various job boards and sites like Naukri, Jobsahead, Monster and Timesjobs to source right professionals Screening and short-listing the candidatures in accordance to the requirements Conducting preliminary discussion with candidates to ascertain their competencies, skills and aspirations (based on work, position, salary and relocation etc). Handling walk in drive single handily. Coordinating the technical and management interviews of the candidates Close follow up with the candidate as well as with the Business till the candidate joins HCL Technologies Taking care of all the joining formalities of candidates - salary & offer letter details. Keeping a Database of all candidates and find profiles from there as and when required.

position.title: Associate Sr Manager - Recruitments
position.summary:
Established in 1990, Persistent Systems is an outsourcing innovator and leader, focused exclusively on product development, with 4,000 employees
- The primary responsibilities of this role includes workforce planning for the India operations, determine short and long term staffing requirements, create strategies & action plans to hire the right talent from the market through the selection process, ensuring overall process integrity and providing relevant and timely reporting on staffing activities. - Ability to recruit in a volume / high pressure environment where lot of hiring is just in time hiring. Also have the ability to be creative in terms of the hiring sources and device strategies to generate candidate leads from both traditional / nontraditional sources, create appropriate sales pitch to attract top talent in the organization - Heading the Nagpur and Hyderabad Centre for staffing needs. - Actively involved in defining and managing the recruitment budgets.

person.headline: Strategist, Marketer - Convergence, New Media and Broadband Audiences. @deepakslore

position.title: Principal
position.summary: I spend most of my time at Lattice Media mentoring entrepreneurs and advising on marketing and product strategy. And yes freelance consulting around the business of content and audience.

position.title: Senior Director, Business Development
position.summary: It was truly a wonderful year at Juniper's Strategic Alliances team following the acquisition of Ankeena. I helped establish and run Content & Audience partnerships across multiple Juniper's product and business units. The importance of advanced content delivery infrastructure for scalable and quality delivery of video has never been higher. And audience intelligence has never been so dependent on the where, how and what of the engagement - requiring infrastructure awareness. My work covered partnerships in both these areas, that are so critical to service monetization. And with those foundations having been laid and in the hands of a wonderful team, it is time now for my next play in 'layer 8, 9 and 10" of the IP stack. ;-)

position.title: VP of Corporate & Business Development
position.summary: As VP of Corporate and Business Development my responsibilities include developing new markets, new verticals and forging strategic partnerships that further the competitive position of the company, create new revenue sources and add to the overall value of the business. I have now spent 15 years in just about every corner of convergence and digital media and I can say without hestitation that this last piece in that big jigsaw is going to be the most fun.

position.title: VP Product Management
position.summary: As VP of Product Management at 24/7 Real Media, Deepak was responsible for the coordination of product management, product marketing, and product innovation worldwide. He served with the team as it doubled revenue to in two years to $200 million with a successful exit after the acquisition by WPP.

position.title: Board of Directors
position.summary:
Privately held startup in Mumbai India. www.mobiance.com
They focus on Location Based Services for enterprise vehicle fleets as well as mobile salesforce productivity applications. I invested some seed money in this startup and provide guidance to the founders.

position.title: CEO
position.summary: Deepak co-founded Enscaler Inc., a provider of middleware, applications and services for rights managed and secure streaming media. As CEO, Deepak grew Enscaler to multi-million dollar revenues with over 40 Fortune 1000 clients in enterprise, education and entertainment.

position.title: IT Recruiter
position.summary:
Responsibilities:
• Handling the end-to-end recruitment cycle of IT requirements (from sourcing to on boarding) of the company. • To interact with the clients and collect the requirements • To understand properly about client. • Sourcing profiles through referral, head hunting, job portals, taking references, networking. • Sourcing the profiles as per the clients' requirements. • Follow up with candidates and clients till the offer is rolled out and assuring candidates joining the respective company. • Processing the trackers to the clients on time, taking the post interview feedback from clients and scheduling them for the next level of interviews. • Maintaining trackers like daily trackers, weekly trackers, monthly trackers and monthly information system (MIS) tracker. Sending the consolidated team trackers to the project manager.
Skills worked on: Sun technologies : Java, JSP, Servlets, Struts, Spring, Hibernate, JSF Mainframes : as/400,COBOL, CICS, DB2, JCL,MQ Series, Rexx. ERP Packages : SAP SD, MM, PP, BASIS, Oracle apps, People soft. Application servers : Jboss, Websphere, Weblogic CRM Tools : Siebel(Config, Admin) SAP(ABAP,XI,FICO,SD,PM,MM) Web based application: .net3.0 3.5 Framework, WCF, WPF, Visual Studio 2008,SQL Server) Testing : QTP, Manual(Bugzilla,Bug tracker),Performance testing. Datawarehouse : Teradata, Informatica, Cognos, Business Objects Open System tools : C, c++, Solaris, AIX, HP-Unix, Linux Database : SQL DBA, Oracle DBA, Oracle Apps DBA, PLSQL, HRMS

position.title: Technical recruiter
position.summary:
Virtualization is the technology that is poised to change the way we think about computing. VMware (NYSE: VMW) is the global leader in virtualization solutions from the desktop to the datacenter. Customers of all sizes rely on VMware to reduce capital and operating expenses, ensure business continuity, strengthen security and go green. With 2008 revenues of $1.9 billion, more than 130,000 customers and more than 22,000 partners, VMware is one of the fastest-growing public software companies. VMware’s award-winning technology, market-leading position and culture of excellence provide the more than 6,600 passionate people we employ in 40 locations worldwide with a platform for professional growth and the excitement of being an early-stage innovator. Interested in joining us or know someone who might be? Contact me directly or visit www.vmware.com/jobs to learn more about us and apply today.
Looking for Windows system programmers, familiar on reverse engineering,API hooking. QA and dev positions
